text: mariyu evadiki allah margadarsakatvam cestado atade sanmargam pondutadu. Mariyu evadini ayana margabhrastatvanlo padanistado vadiki, ayana tappa, itarula nevvarini nivu sanraksakuluga pondalevu. Mariyu varini memu punarut'thana dinamuna gruddivariga, mugavariga mariyu cevitivariga cesi, vari mukhala mida borla padavesi lagutu progucestamu. Vari asrayam narakame! Adi callarinappudalla memu varikai agnijvalanu tivram cestamu
